trans-unit.source: Indicates that the implementer wants to be a lifetime lease sponsor.
trans-unit.target: 指示实施者想要生存期租约发起人。

trans-unit.source: An object must implement the ISponsor interface if it needs to request a lease renewal for a particular object.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要请求租约续订特定对象，对象必须实现 ISponsor 接口。

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the ISponsor interface can become a sponsor by registering itself with the lease manager.
trans-unit.target: 实现 ISponsor 接口的对象，可以通过向的租用管理器注册本身变为发起人。

trans-unit.source: The ISponsor interface is used by the lifetime service to call back to the sponsor.
trans-unit.target: ISponsor 接口生存期服务用于回调到发起人。

trans-unit.source: Requests a sponsoring client to renew the lease for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 请求发起客户端续订的租约指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The Renewal method is called by the distributed garbage collector to renew the lease for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 续订方法称为分布式的垃圾回收器，若要续订的租约指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The lifetime lease of the object that requires lease renewal.
trans-unit.target: 需要续订租约的对象生存期租约。

trans-unit.source: The additional lease time for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的对象附加租用时间。

trans-unit.source: The immediate caller makes the call through a reference to the interface and does not have infrastructure permission.
trans-unit.target: 直接调用方发出通过接口的引用调用，而不具有基础结构的权限。
